alert.note: Alert for Brown; Monroe (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 9:16PM EDT until July 17 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Monroe County in south central Indiana... Southern Brown County in south central Indiana... * Until 1000 PM EDT. * At 915 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bloomington, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Woodville Hills and Yellowwood Lake around 930 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Nashville, Elkinsville, Story and Stone Head. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
